articles.title: 5th Enlarged Plenary Meeting of 9th C.C., Youth League
articles.content:
5th Enlarged Plenary Meeting of 9th C.C., Youth League
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- The 5th enlarged plenary meeting of the 9th Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League took place here Tuesday.
					 The meeting discussed how to carry through the tasks set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un at the 2nd plenary meeting of the 7th Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The report was followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers noted that the Supreme Leader at the plenary meeting clarified the orientation and tasks for bringing about a fresh upsurge in the implementation of the decisions made at the 7th Congress of the WPK under the uplifted banner of independence and the self-development-first principle.
					
					 They stressed the need for youth league organizations at all levels to help their members fully discharge their honorable mission and duty as the youth vanguard of Juche Korea by giving fullest play to their strength, wisdom and enthusiasm in the on-going historical advance. 
					
					 They called upon all the youths to fully display their honor of being an advancing group and wing of the Party in every field of the building of a powerful socialist country, true to the spirit of the 2nd plenary meeting of the 7th Central Committee of the WPK.
					
					 The enlarged plenary meeting dealt with the organizational matter.
					
					 At the meeting Jon Yong Nam was relieved of his post and Pak Chol Min was elected first secretary of the C.C., the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League.

articles.title: 4th Enlarged Plenary Meeting of 7th C.C., GFTUK
articles.content:
4th Enlarged Plenary Meeting of 7th C.C., GFTUK
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- The 4th enlarged plenary meeting of the 7th Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) took place here on Tuesday.
					 Present there were members and alternate members of the C.C., GFTUK and officials of the federation.
					
					 The meeting discussed how to carry out the tasks set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un at the Second Plenary Meeting of the Seventh Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the C.C., GFTUK, made a report at the meeting and then followed speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers stressed that all the trade union officials and members should make a new leap forward in the drive for implementing the decisions made at the Seventh Congress of the WPK and thus successfully put into practice the grandiose plan and resolve of the Party.
					
					 They underlined the need to take the work for establishing the strict monolithic leadership system of the Party as a principal task of the federation and firmly consolidate the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks.

articles.title: 28th National Exhibition of IT Achievements Opens
articles.content:
28th National Exhibition of IT Achievements Opens
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- The 28th national exhibition of IT achievements opened with due ceremony at the Sci-Tech Complex on Tuesday.
					 On display there are more than 1 100 valuable findings made in the work to radically develop the country's IT.
					
					 Among the exhibits are process control programs and integrated management information system and other automation equipment conductive to putting the production and management of factories and enterprises on an automated, unmanned and intellectual basis, and IT successes achieved in fields of education, public health, sports and literature and arts.
					
					 The exhibition is divided into six panels including information security, information communication networks, artificial intelligence and information processing, equipment and production process control and scientific and technological calculation.
					
					 Program contests of various fields such as speech recognition, character recognition and integrated production systems are to be held during the exhibition.
					
					 Among those present at the ceremony were Vice-Premier Jon Kwang Ho and other officials concerned.

articles.title: German Guest Here
articles.content:
German Guest Here
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- Wolfgang Nowak, former general director for Political Planning of Mr. Schroeder's Cabinet of Germany, arrived here Tuesday.

articles.title: DPRK Olympic Committee Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Olympic Committee Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Olympic Committee led by Chairman Kim Il Guk, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, came back home Tuesday after taking part in the 22nd ANOC General Assembly held in Prague of the Czech Republic.

articles.title: Commemorative Medal of October Socialist Revolution Awarded to Great Leaders of DPRK
articles.content:
Commemorative Medal of October Socialist Revolution Awarded to Great Leaders of DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK presented in their joint name the 100th Anniversary of the October Socialist Revolution Medals and Certificates to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The medals and certificates were conveyed to Kim Hyong Jun, DPRK ambassador to Russia, by Victor Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK who is secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of the Soviet Union, on Nov. 3.

articles.title: DPRK Football Team Beats Its Hong Kong Rival 5:1
articles.content:
DPRK Football Team Beats Its Hong Kong Rival 5:1
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- The 2018 AFC U-19 Championships are underway in Vietnam from Nov. 4.
					 The DPRK team in Group J beat its China Hong Kong Team 5:1 on Monday.
					
					 It will play the last group match with its Australian rival on Wednesday.

articles.title: Concert Given to Full House in Anju City
articles.content:
Concert Given to Full House in Anju City
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- A concert is being given to full house in Anju City of South Phyongan Province by the State Merited Chorus, the Moranbong Band and the Wangjaesan Art Troupe.
					 The performers made a truthful ideological and artistic depiction of the faith and will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to achieve the final victory of the cause of socialism without fail, closely united around the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: New Tree Planting Methods Introduced in DPRK
articles.content:
New Tree Planting Methods Introduced in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- New tree planting methods have been introduced in the DPRK amid the brisk tree planting movement.
					 The Academy of Forest Science under the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection has completed new tree planting methods using salt water of certain concentration, humate and acrylic terracottem and provided a scientific guarantee to boost the rate of rooting of trees.
					
					 The General Bureau of Forestry under the ministry has pushed ahead with the work to introduce these methods into many cities and counties of the country.
					
					 Kusong City and Kujang, Uiju and Sonchon counties of North Phyongan Province planted trees with the method of soaking roots in humate and foliage dressing method. 
					
					 In particular, Larix lepolepis has begun to strike root in more than 1 100 hectares of sterile land in Unsan County in South Phyongan Province.
					
					 Pyongyang City also found out a method for using acrylic terracottem effectively and introduced it into tree planting.
					
					 Now the Academy of Forest Science is working hard to ensure high rate of rooting of trees in summer.

articles.title: Mineral Production on Increase in DPRK
articles.content:
Mineral Production on Increase in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- The Taehung Youth Hero Mine in the DPRK has increased the mineral production.
					 According to data available, the production of magnesia clinker and light burned magnesia went up 1.1 times and 1.15 times respectively in recent one month as compared with the same period of last year.
					
					 The Pukdu branch mine is carrying out its daily quota at 1.2 times after securing more than hundred thousands of tons of indicated reserves.
					
					 The Muhak branch mine also boosted its mineral production by 1.15 times by putting the operation of large-sized crusher and long-distance belt conveyor on a normal basis.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il visited the mine in May, Juche 98 (2009). Saying that the mine abundant in quality magnesite ore is promising, he instructed to turn the mine into a world-leading mineral producer.
					
					 He named the mine the Taehung Youth Hero Mine.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying History of Gold Seas
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying History of Gold Seas
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday editorially calls for glorifying the history of gold seas by achieving big fish hauls in the winter-fishing campaign.
					 The fishing campaign today is a drive to uphold the Party policies and defend the socialist system, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 This year our army and people brought about a good result in the agricultural production, despite serious draught, with the great might of the army-people unity and the spirit of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 The fishing sector should make "spectacular scenery of big fish catch" in every port by putting energetic efforts to implementing the ideas of the Party and upholding its policies. Then, the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, who had worked heart and soul to provide the people with abundant fish, will be more thoroughly implemented and the history of gold seas will be given continuity.
					
					 All the officials and workers in the fishing sector should bring about a proud victory in the winter-fishing campaign with big fish hauls to give a great pleasure to the people in the socialist system, true to the Party's intention.

articles.title: U.S. Nuclear Threats against DPRK Will Backfire: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Nuclear Threats against DPRK Will Backfire: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- The U.S. accustomed to aggression is now stepping up military pressure on the DPRK under the pretext of "nuclear threats from the north", says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary.
					 The U.S., a thrice-cursed nuclear criminal which was the first to have access to nukes in the world and inflict nuclear disaster upon humankind, is now clamors about "nuclear threat" from someone while running wild in war hysteria. This is the height of shamelessness, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The present grave situation once again clearly shows that Trump's mad remarks of "total destruction" and "annihilation" of the DPRK have resulted in military gambling and that it is just the U.S. which poses threat to the DPRK's existence and development and brings disastrous nuclear war to the Korean peninsula.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists try to alarm the DPRK with nuclear threat and blackmail, it will be a big mistake.
					
					 They are persistently clinging to the anachronistic anti-DPRK policy and confrontation racket, oblivious of the reality in which fundamental changes have been made in the DPRK's strategic position and mechanical relations between the DPRK and U.S. This is little different from sickening conducts of dolts without any foresight.
					
					 The more the U.S. engrossed in its daydream persists in the reckless military threat and moves to strangle the DPRK, the bitterer defeat it will suffer.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Puppet Forces' Bellicose Acts
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Puppet Forces' Bellicose Acts
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet warmongers kicked off a "Latter Half of 2017 Chungmu" drill and "Hwarang" drill in three regions, including South Jolla Province and Jeju Island, under the pretext of "coping with the north's threat and provocation" with military units, administrative organs and civilians mobilized.
					 Against this backdrop the puppet forces launched the north-targeted large-scale "Hoguk" drill with the U.S.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun in a commentary Tuesday says that such simultaneous war exercises are pushing the tensions on the Korean peninsula to the worst phase.
					
					 Their provocative saber-rattling is not only a foolish act to mobilize all manpower and material resources of south Korea as well as the puppet army for the U.S. reckless war moves against the DPRK in contingency in the peninsula but also a sinister charade to incite among the south Korean people the hostility towards the fellow countrymen and a war atmosphere, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The present ruling forces in south Korea are wicked traitors to the nation who do not hesitate to put everything in the American master's mouth and ignite a war against the north so as to prolong their remaining days.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are now getting hell-bent on the anti-DPRK sanctions and pressure and war moves, viciously criticizing the DPRK's measure for bolstering up its nuclear deterrent for self-defense as "provocation" and "threat". However, the reality shows that the provocateurs and warmongers are none other than the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces who escalate the tensions and bring a nuclear disaster to the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The puppet trigger-happy forces will have to pay dearly for their reckless confrontational acts of doing harm to the destiny of the nation with the backing of foreign forces.

articles.title: Disgusting Behavior of Hong Jun Phyo Denounced
articles.content:
Disgusting Behavior of Hong Jun Phyo Denounced
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- Recently, traitor Hong Jun Phyo, representative of the south Korean conservative opposition "Liberal Korea Party", behaved disgustingly during his mendicant junket to the U.S. No sooner had he arrived in the U.S. than he visited the cemetery of the Korean War dead of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces. He met officials of the U.S. administration, members of Congress and experts on the issues of the Korean peninsula to claim the U.S.-south Korea "NATO style nuclear alliance" and "redeployment of tactical nuclear weapons" under the present serious situation.
					 Hong's visit to the U.S. revealed his true colors as the top-class pro-American lackey, despicable political charlatan and heinous human scum, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a commentary, adding:
					
					 The history of south Korean politics has recorded many conservatives who kowtowed to the U.S. However, it does not know such worthless fellow as Hong who made a spectacle of himself by begging for nuclear weapons.
					
					 His request for "redeployment of tactical nuclear weapons" is, in fact, little short of begging the U.S. master to use nukes any time like conventional weapons on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 What is more intolerable is that Hong insulted the DPRK with a flurry of unspeakable invective and called for confrontation with the north, saying that Trump's way of nuclear counteraction to the north is very appropriate.
					
					 Minju Joson in a commentary says the behaviors of traitor Hong, a top-class criminal to be detained are a tragedy of the south Korean society and a disgrace to the nation, stressing that such trouble-maker should be thrown overboard as early as possible.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries Warned against Inviting Self-destruction: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries Warned against Inviting Self-destruction: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- The Japan Air "Self-Defense Force" fighters held war exercises in the sky above Kyushu together with U.S. B-1 strategic bomber formation. Some days later, the Cabinet secretariat and the Shizuoka Prefecture office held a drill of evacuating train passengers simulating the missile attack.
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says it goes without saying that these exercises were carried out in a planned way for meeting a sinister purposes.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The situation on the Korean peninsula inches close to a serious phase due to Trump's reckless sanctions and pressure against the DPRK and thoughtless nuclear war racket.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are trying to fan up this and draw water to their mill.
					
					 It is the crafty trick of the Japanese politicians to fish in troubled waters by taking the advantage of the U.S. war frenzy.
					
					 Lurking behind the loud trumpeting about "threat" from the DPRK by the Japanese reactionaries is to instill hatred toward the DPRK into the Japanese nationals and benefit from it in realizing their reinvasion ambition.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should not do such foolish an act as inviting ruin.
					
					 If they insult the dignity of the DPRK and come out as a shock brigade of the U.S. for aggression, the army and people of the DPRK will give vent to the pent-up wrath and grudge and make the Japanese reactionaries pay a dear price for having inflicted all sorts of misfortune and pain on the Korean nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Defense Minister's Provocative Remarks Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Defense Minister's Provocative Remarks Flailed
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- Puppet Defense Minister of south Korea Song Yong Mu in his appearance at a "National Assembly" session, when asked a question about the "level of threats from the north", made no scruple of talking about the "collapse of the north".
					 His words are nothing but sheer sophism of a despicable war accomplice as he is bringing the worst danger of a war to the Korean peninsula, being pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, says Minju Joson says in a commentary Tuesday, adding:
					
					 Those remarks are so fanatic and bellicose as enough to put into the shade his predecessors who worked with blood shot eyes for making the invasion of the north a practice.
					
					 Even their master U.S. is now at a loss, being unable to find a way for checking the advance of the DPRK. However, such a small guy as Song Yong Mu is trumpeting about the "decapitation operational plan" and the founding of an elite airborne division for "attacking the headquarters of the north". This reminds one of a saying like master like man.
					
					 We have already and clearly warned that those who challenge the dignity and social system of the DPRK will face merciless punishment. Song Yong Mu who disclosed his despicable nature as a confrontational maniac is not without exception.
					
					 The south Korean chief executive appointed the confrontational maniac to the post of defense minister and has supported him. Therefore, he has to feel due responsibility for the senseless words of Song.

articles.title: Minju Joson Reveals Abe Regime's Earlier General Election
articles.content:
Minju Joson Reveals Abe Regime's Earlier General Election
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- There was the election for the members of the House of Representatives in Japan on Oct. 22. In the election which was held earlier than scheduled the Liberal Democratic Party-New Komeito Party coalition won, making Abe's long-term stay in office possible.
					 After the election dignitaries including Abe discussed the issue of the constitutional revision before others. Japanese Prime Minister Abe and Chief Cabinet Secretary Suga identified their intention to buckle down to the detailed procedures for the constitutional revision.
					
					 Commenting on the fact, Minju Joson Tuesday says that the basic purpose sought by the Abe regime when it dismissed the House of Representatives earlier and held the general election was to revise the "pacifist constitution".
					
					 The news analyst goes on:
					
					 It has been a political goal sought by the Abe family throughout history to revise the "Pacifist Constitution" and replace it by a war constitution. The reason that the Abe regime is so keen on revising the constitution is because it would be impossible for it to realize the ambition for overseas expansion without riding itself of the "yoke" of the present constitution.
					
					 It is the political logic of the Japanese reactionaries that the failed old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere" must come true at any cost and therefore the constitutional revision is inevitable.
					
					 The danger of the tragic crimes, which the Japanese imperialists committed in the past for the dream of continental aggression, is looming large.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are seriously mistaken, however. Their crafty calculation to open a way out for overseas invasion will only invite self-destruction.
					
					 They will be made to clearly understand what a high price they will have to pay for going reckless, being seized by ambition for reinvasion.

articles.title: Anti-U.S., Anti-War Actions Get Stronger in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-U.S., Anti-War Actions Get Stronger in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- Public actions are getting stronger in south Korea against war maniac Trump's visit to south Korea and the U.S. moves of aggression.
					 Mass meetings were reportedly held across south Korea under the sponsorship of the No-Trump Joint Action on Nov. 4. Many civic and social organizations sponsored a rally in Seoul on Nov. 5 in protest against the U.S. moves for igniting a war.
					
					 Speakers said the situation on the Korean peninsula has reached the worst-ever phase due to Trump's racket for a nuclear war.
					
					 Noting south Korea will be reduced to ashes once a war breaks out, they called on the public to prevent it.
					
					 They appealed to the public to turn out in the actions for frustrating the U.S. moves for igniting a war against the north.
					
					 Their actions will reportedly reach their climax on Tuesday and Wednesday when Trump will set his feet in south Korea.
					
					 The Joint Action is planning to hold mammoth protest rallies on those days.

articles.title: Anti-Trump Protests Staged in Major Cities of U.S.
articles.content:
Anti-Trump Protests Staged in Major Cities of U.S.
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S., together with its progressive organizations for peace, took a demonstration in Washington, New York, Chicago and Los Angeles on Nov. 3 and 4 to protest Trump's policy, according to the south Korean Internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 The solidarity demonstration was launched in response to the call for a joint action against Trump from the south Korean Anti-Trump Joint Action.
					
					 Its participants urged the U.S. administration to withdraw the GIs from south Korea and other parts of the world.
					
					 In a statement they noted that as soon as Trump announced his plan on Asia visit, actions against Trump and the U.S. military adventure were launched all at once in 140-odd regions of Japan, Vietnam, Philippines and other countries, let alone south Korea.
					
					 Since there are many U.S. military bases in Asia-Pacific, military conflict on the Korean peninsula will result in deaths in its surrounding countries, not to mention the peninsula, the statement warned.

articles.title: S. Korean Broadcasting Service on Farce of LKP
articles.content:
S. Korean Broadcasting Service on Farce of LKP
Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- CBS of south Korea on Nov. 3 commented on the "Liberal Korea Party" hypocritical expelling Park Geun Hye from the party.
					 Hong Jun Phyo, representative of the party, said that the measure was taken to restore public confidence but CBS asserted that it is aimed at merger of the LKP and "Parun Party" ahead of local elections due in June next year so as to rally the conservative forces around itself.
					
					 It said that it would be difficult for the LKP to restore public confidence.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Calls for Stopping Trump's Visit to S. Korea
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Calls for Stopping Trump's Visit to S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Minjok Ilbo on Nov. 6 carried an editorial titled "It is necessary to prevent Trump's war visit without fail".
					 Referring to the massive anti-Trump and anti-U.S. struggle in the whole of south Korea and the U.S., Japan and other parts of the world, the editorial said that such struggle was attributable to Trump and the imperialist U.S. escalating the war crisis.
					
					 The world people are waging such struggle as they want peace, the paper said, calling for stopping Trump's war visit to south Korea at any cost.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak and His Accomplices Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak and His Accomplices Denounced in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- The Culture and Arts Measure Committee for Combating Evils and Achieving Democracy in Culture of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Nov. 4 to denounce Lee Myung Bak and his accomplices for taming the cultural and art circles by blacklisting them, according to Yonhap News.
					 A blacklist case committed by the Park Geun Hye regime was disclosed one year ago and now it was known that the root cause started from the Lee Myung Bak regime, the organization said.
					
					 It charged that Lee Myung Bak worked out a blacklist of persons critical of the authorities and suppressed them by depriving them of their jobs.

articles.title: More Data on Traitor Park's Crimes Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
More Data on Traitor Park's Crimes Disclosed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- The fact was reportedly disclosed in south Korea that traitor Park Geun Hye, a kingpin of hideous corruption and irregularities, received enormous funds from the puppet Intelligence Service.
					 Ri Jae Man, former secretary for General Affairs at Chongwadae, confessed that he received four billions won from the IS on the directions of Park.
					
					 The puppet prosecution announced that it would launch a probe into how the money Park received from the IS was used.

articles.title: Candlelight Action Staged in S. Korea to Demand Detention of Traitor Lee
articles.content:
Candlelight Action Staged in S. Korea to Demand Detention of Traitor Lee
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- The candlelight action for detention of traitor Lee Myung Bak is growing stronger in south Korea amid the fierce struggle of various circles for removal of the conservative evils as more crimes committed during his regime have been disclosed one after another, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of Seoul.
					 The headquarters of the People's Action for Punishment of Lee Myung Bak and "Commando for Punishing MB" on Nov. 4 held a candlelight rally in front of the house of Lee to demand overall reexamination of the scandals of the Lee Myung Bak regime and detention and investigation of Lee.
					
					 Speakers at the rally called for punishing Lee as well as the "Liberal Korea Party" protecting him with the might of the people.
					
					 They expressed their will to stage the candlelight rally for detention of Lee Myung Bak and removal of evils every day.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Slovenia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Slovenia
 Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- A Slovenian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Maribor City on Nov. 2.
					 Igor Jurisic, chairman of the Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il and organize seminar, lecture, film show and other political and cultural events on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Se efectua reunion ampliada de 5a sesion plenaria de 9o periodo de CC de Union de Juventud
articles.content:
Se efectua reunion ampliada de 5a sesion plenaria de 9o periodo de CC de Union de Juventud
Pyongyang, 7 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Hoy, tuvo lugar en esta capital la reunion ampliada de la 5a sesion plenaria del 9o periodo del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista.
					Tomaron parte los miembros y los suplentes del CC de la Union de la Juventud y los funcionarios de esta organizacion juvenil.
					
					La reunion discutio las medidas para materializar las tareas presentadas por el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un en la segunda sesion plenaria del septimo periodo del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Hubo informe e intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores subrayaron que en esa reunion partidista, el Maximo Dirigente aclaro el rumbo de lucha y las tareas para provocar con el poderio de la unidad monolitica nuevos ascensos en la materializacion de la decision del VII Congreso del PTC al levantar en alto la bandera de la independencia y dando prioridad al autofortalecimiento.
					
					Refirieron la necesidad de que todos los jovenes cumplen con su mision y deber honorarios como vanguardias juveniles de Corea del Juche dedicando todo lo suyo por el avance historico de hoy.
					
					Exhortaron a manifestar sin reservas el honor de patrulla y unidad de flanco del Partido en todos los campos de la construccion de la potencia socialista, en acato al espiritu de la reunion plenaria del CC del PTC.
					
					Acto seguido, se debatio el problema de organizacion.
					
					En la ocasion Jon Yong Nam fue destituido por relacion de trabajo y Pak Chol Min, electo como primer secretario del CC de la Union de la Juventud.

articles.title: Efectuada reunion ampliada 4o pleno del septimo periodo del CC de FGSC
articles.content:
Pyongyang, 7 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 7 en esta capital la reunion ampliada del 4o pleno del septimo periodo del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea.
					Participaron alli los miembros y los miembros suplentes del CC de la FGSC y los funcionarios de esta organizacion.
					
					En la ocasion se debatieron las medidas para materializar las tareas presentadas por el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un en el 2o pleno del septimo periodo del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Hubo el informe de Ju Yong Gil, presidente del CC de la FGSC e intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que todos los funcionarios y miembros de la organizacion sindical deben lograr nuevos saltos en la materializacion de la decision del VII Congreso del PTC levantando en alto la bandera de la independencia y dando prioridad al autofortalecimiento, para realizar exitosamente el grandioso proyecto y la decision del partido.
					
					Refirieron la necesidad de tomar como linea principal el trabajo para establecer mas estrictamente el sistema de direccion unica del partido y consolidar con mas firmeza la unidad monolitica de las filas revolucionarias.

articles.title: Inaugurada 28a exposicion nacional de exitos de IT
articles.content:
Inaugurada 28a exposicion nacional de exitos de IT
Pyongyang, 7 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 7 en el Palacio de Ciencias y Tecnicas la ceremonia de inauguracion de la 28a exposicion nacional de exitos de IT, con la participacion del vicepremier Jon Kwang Ho, los funcionarios interesados y de las unidades participantes en la exposicion, los trabajadores y los jovenes y estudiantes.
					En la ocasion fueron presentados mas de mil 100 datos valiosos de exitos logrados en los esfuerzos por desarrollar con rapidez la tecnologia informatica del pais.
					
					Entre ellos figuran los programas de control del proceso que permiten realizar la automatizacion de la produccion y las actividades empresariales de las fabricas y las empresas, el sistema informatico de administracion integral, los elementos y aparatos de la automatizacion y los exitos de las ramas de educacion, salud publica, deportes, literatura y arte.
					
					La exhibicion se realiza dividida en 6 secciones tales como la seguridad informatica y la red de comunicaciones informaticas, la inteligencia artificial y el tratamiento de las informaciones, el control de los equipos y el proceso productivo, etc.
					
					Durante la galeria se efectuaran tambien los concursos de programas de diversas ramas inclusive los programas de la distincion facial, la cognicion fonetica y de letras y el analisis de juegos deportivos simulados y los sistemas de la produccion integral y la divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas.

articles.title: Seleccion coreana de futbol vence a la de Hong Kong de China
articles.content:
Seleccion coreana de futbol vence a la de Hong Kong de China
Pyongyang, 7 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tienen lugar del dia 4 en Vietnam los partidos del grupo J de las clasificatorias del Campeonato Sub-19 de la Confederacion Asiatica de Futbol 2018.
					El equipo coreano vencio por 5 a 1 a su rival de Hong Kong de China.
					
					El dia 8 se competira con su rival australiano.
